segments.text: The upper cabinets are open, revealing that tempting cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced, one hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, arm extended in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink overflows unnoticed, water pouring relentlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is fixated on her plate, ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress are spotless so far, but not for long.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens, threatening slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden path looks inviting and safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's a recipe for trouble with the cookie theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how oblivious everyone seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The small window panes divide the serene view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could all turn into a sad accident soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel bunches up in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a tense moment in this ordinary kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
